author: tkstanczak
content: Checklist:

author: tkstanczak
content: have a list of enodes of all participating nodes

author: tkstanczak
content: make static nodes connections between all the nodes upfront

author: tkstanczak
content: confirm that any node is capable of sending one transaction of legacy and eip1559 types each to the network and get included in the block

author: tkstanczak
content: share the ethstats, alethio addresses with all particpants

author: tkstanczak
content: have access to machine logs and be able to retrieve them when needed

author: tkstanczak
content: confirm that there are no disconnections between nodes when idle

author: tkstanczak
content: define progression levels for the testing procedure (at what gas levels we start)

author: tkstanczak
content: possibly -> define storage touching transactions for the test too? or for accounts -> ensure that we do not use same accounts over and over again which would enable caching and falsify the results

author: tkstanczak
content: for Nethermind -> setup more than one node for tests
